column1: Yanamalakuduru is a census town in Krishna district of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. It is  located in Penamaluru mandal of Vijayawada revenue division. As per the G.O. No. M.S.104 (dated:23-03-2017)
column2: Municipal Administration and Urban Development Department
column3: it became a part of Vijayawada metropolitan area.

column1: The primary and secondary school education is imparted by government
column3: under the School Education Department of the state. The medium of instruction followed by different schools are English
